attributes.action: Bring back Hanging!!! Take a life, lose your life!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Life should mean life, but it doesn't! Therefore, murderers, who decide to take it upon themselves to take someones life from them, should have their lives taken from them in turn.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
